top.title: Germany accuses Russia of air traffic control cyber-attack
top.summary: The Russian ambassador is summoned over a cyber-attack on air traffic control and attempted electoral interference.

top.title: EU backs indefinite freeze on Russia's frozen cash ahead of big loan plan for Ukraine
top.summary: After almost four years of Russia's full-scale war, Kyiv is running out of cash, and needs an estimated €135.7bn over the next two years.

top.title: Trump's Gaza peace plan struggles to progress as Israel and Hamas face tough choices
top.summary: Getting both sides to move onto the second stage is a huge challenge for Washington, as Gazans continue to suffer the longer it takes.

top.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes
top.summary: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

top.title: Creative industries 'incredibly worried' about OpenAI-Disney deal
top.summary: The $1bn deal will let fans generate videos and images of more than 200 Disney characters on ChatGPT and Sora.

top.title: Clair Obscur sweeps The Game Awards with nine wins
top.summary: The French-made role-playing game is named game of the year on a night of prizes and announcements.
